en-US.summary: This is for Dan to use for tech support.
en-US.name: Marcus: The Plug
en-US.description:
Ask for Marcus, and let him know what you need help with.

Marcus:The Plug is the guy's guy and is always there when you need him, but here's a way to help make it easier for him

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Marcus:The Plug" or "Alexa, open Marcus: The Plug" to get started".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

examplePhrases: Alexa ask space facts for a fact
Alexa tell space facts to tell me trivia
en-GB.name: Space Facts
en-GB.description:
Ask for Space Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Space Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Space Facts" or "Alexa, open Space Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

examplePhrases: Alexa ask space facts for a fact
Alexa tell space facts to tell me trivia
